title: Dish, ca. 1820
provenance: Delomosne and Son, LTD, London, purchased (4-7-66 to WPW from c.f. Mortimerof Delomosne and Son, LTD.)
description: Oblong, boat shape dish with flared sides and squared ends. Sides cut with band of alternating panels of fine diamonds and flutes. Fluted bottom. Inverted scallop rim.

tombstone.epitaph:
Dish, ca. 1820.
ca. 1820. glass. Bequest of Walter Phelps Warren. 1986-61-180.
